articles.description: As news about Sony's Playstation 5 starts to finally come in more consistently, we take a look at what the CEO had to say about the pricing.
articles.content: Sony is finally opening-up on its next-gen console, PlayStation 5, after having kept mum for most of the year. With a game reveal showcase now confirmed for June 4, we can expect further news to star… [+3158 chars]
